trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object that specifies the primary connection.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> que especifica a conexão primária.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object that specifies the connection to dereference.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> que especifica a conexão a desreferenciar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DereferenceConnectionCallback" /> delegate dereferences a connection that is no longer required.
trans-unit.target: O delegado <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DereferenceConnectionCallback" /> desreferencia uma conexão que não é mais necessária.

trans-unit.source: The connection was probably established through a successful call to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QueryForConnectionCallback" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.NotifyOfNewConnectionCallback" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Provavelmente, a conexão foi estabelecida por meio de uma chamada bem-sucedida para o delegado <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.QueryForConnectionCallback" /> ou <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.NotifyOfNewConnectionCallback" />.
